data.eml:eml: Description of the larva of Tetragonoderus (Crossonychus) variegatus Dejean, 1829 (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cyclosomini) with notes on biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Guilherme Ide Marques Dos (2015): Description of the larva of Tetragonoderus (Crossonychus) variegatus Dejean, 1829 (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cyclosomini) with notes on biology. Zootaxa 3973 (1): 102-118, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3973.1.3
